transcript:
Agent: Hi, my name is John and I'm calling from XYZ Corporation. How are you today?
Customer: I'm doing well, thanks. Who is this and what's this about?
Agent: We're a leading provider of cybersecurity solutions, and I'm calling to discuss our latest product, CyberShield.
Customer: Cybersecurity, huh? We've been having some issues with malware lately.
Agent: I see. CyberShield is a comprehensive solution that protects against malware, viruses, and other online threats.
Customer: That sounds interesting. What makes it different from other products on the market?
Agent: Our product uses AI-powered technology to detect and respond to threats in real-time, giving you an extra layer of protection.
Customer: Okay, I'd like to learn more. What kind of support do you offer?
Agent: We offer 24/7 technical support, as well as regular software updates to ensure you're always protected.
Customer: That's great. What's the cost of the product?
Agent: Our pricing starts at $500 per year for a basic plan, with discounts available for larger businesses.
Customer: That's a bit higher than I was expecting. Do you have any promotions or discounts available?
Agent: Actually, we're running a promotion right now where you can get 10% off your first year's subscription.
Customer: Okay, that sounds good. I'd like to try it out. Can you send me a quote and some more information?
Agent: Absolutely. I'll send you a quote and some more details about the product. Would you like me to follow up with you next week?
Customer: Yes, that would be great. Thanks for your time, John.
Agent: You're welcome. I'll talk to you soon.
